msContents.summary: Tax register, recording day by day the collection of money taxes.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso contains two columns of writing
+ P.Cair. Inv. 57187; P.Iand. VII, 141; P.Mich. Inv. 2830; 3159; 4910

condition.ab: This light-brown papyrus is regularly cut at the left and at the right. Kollesis left of center. (TC)

handDesc.p: Written in a quick but clear cursive. The scribe separated a new entry from the preceding one by underlining the name of the tax payer. Diairesis used occasionally. Below the column space for 3 lines has been left blank. Right at the bottom edge there are traces of writing related to the account. (TC)
